title: The Accident
brief_description: Based on the book by Carol Carrick. A poignant film about growing up, anger and responsibility, loss and acceptance. Chris’ dog is run over and killed while he is on holiday. Chris becomes angry when his father buries the dog without consulting him. His anger turns to respect when his father takes him to the grave and together they select a special boulder as a grave marker. In the end Chris learns how to cope with tragedy and how accidents can be prevented. The sequel to this story is “The Foundling”.
